I - The Magician.Text: Activate: Smoke up to c{} cards in your hand. For each, gain +{} points

II - High Priestess.Text: You can see the order of your cards when viewing the deck

III - The Empress.Text: When you draw a card, they each gain a temporary random color

IV - The Emperor.Text: Activate: Choose up to c{} cards in your hand. They become temporary wilds

IX - The Hermit.Text: Whenever you play a card, if it shares no qualities with the top card, it gains temporary x{} mult

V - The Heirophant.Text: Whenever you play a vanilla card, it gains +{} points and x{} mult

VI - The Lovers.Text: Whenever you play a card, if it shares all colors and values with the top card, it gains temporary x{} mult

VII - The Chariot.Text: At the end of your turns, Clean up c{} card in your hand

VIII - Justice.Text: Whenever your opponent Smokes a card of yours, they draw n{} card

XI - Strength.Text: Whenever you recycle a Smoked card, Clean it

XII - The Hanged Man.Text: When the round ends, gain +{} points for each card in your hand

XIII - Death.Text: If you would lose a round, instead remove this card from your Side Deck. You gain no money this round

XIV - Temperance.Text: When the round ends, if no Side Card was Acticated, gain m{} money

XIX - The Sun.Text: When the round ends, gain m{} money for each card in your hand

XV - The Devil.Text: Whenever you can't play a card on your turn, gain m{} money

XVI - The Tower.Text: Whenever you Smoke cards, gain +{} points for each card Smoked

XVII - The Star.Text: Activate: Draw n{} card. If it can be played, Combo it and continue your turn

XVIII - The Moon.Text: Whenever you draw a Smoked card, Clean it

XX - Judgement.Text: Whenever your opponent Smokes a card of yours, they Smoke n{} random hand cards

XXI - The World.Text: If you ended the round, you gain x{} score Ante

Greed Card.Text: Whenever you draw a card, gain +{} points

Hoarder's Card.Text: Whenever you draw a card, gain +{} per card drawn

AI Generated Card.Text: When round starts, becomes a copy of the card below it

Ash Tray.Text: Whenever you play a Smoked card, gain +{} points

Blood Donor's card.Text: Whenever you play a red card, gain m{} money

Blorbo.Text: Activate: Add a card from your deck to your hand. Draw n{} card

Blue Credit.Text: Blue cards you play have +{} more points

Blue Paintbrush.Text: All cards you play count as blue cards

Booster Pack.Text: Activate: Remove this card. Choose c{} of n{} random cards. Add it to your hand.

Bribe Envelope.Text: Activate: Draw n{} cards. Gain m{} money.

Certificate of Authenticity.Text: Whenever you play a vanilla card, you may Combo another card once.

Empty Canvas.Text: Whenever you play a card, temporarily add its colors to this card. Once all four colors are filled, all cards you play are wild

Even Split.Text: Even cards you play have +{} more points

Event Ticket.Text: Activate: Temporarily add n{} random rare card to your had

Four Eyes.Text: Whenever you Activate a Side Card for the first time, Refresh it

Gift card.Text: When round ends, if you won, Add n{} Side Card slot and remove this card

Green Paintbrush.Text: All cards you play count as green cards

Green Visa.Text: Green cards you play have +{} more points

Hue Picker.Text: When round starts, choose a color. Your opening cards are all temporarily that color

I want to get off Mr. Mau's wild ride.Text:
Whenever you play a card, gain x{}.
Cards you play have x{} mult

ID card.Text: When round starts, choose a temporary color. Cards of the chosen color have x{} mult

Library card.Text: Activate: Recycle up to c{} cards

Machine Printed Card.Text: When round starts, becomes a copy of the card above it

Member's card.Text: When round starts, choose a temporary value. Cards of the chosen value have x{} mult

Metronome.Text: When round ends, gain +{} * turns passed points

Mirage.Text: Activate: Next card you play has x{} mult

Monopoly Money.Text: When round ends: Gain +{} * money points

Mulligan Card.Text: When your turn starts, recycle up to c{} cards

Orange Paintbrush.Text: All cards you play count as orange cards

Papayrus Card.Text:
When your turn starts, you may Smoke any number of cards in your hand and recycle them.
Whenever you draw a Smoked card, Smoke a random opponent's deck card

Paycheck.Text: When round starts, gain money equal to your opening cards

Punch Card.Text: Cards you play have x{} mult for each Side Card you Activated

Recycling Bin.Text: Whenever you recycle a card, gain +{} points

Red Card.Text: Red cards you play have +{} more points

Red Paintbrush.Text: All cards you play count as red cards

Refresh Voucher.Text: First Refresh in the shop is free

Removal Voucher.Text: First Removal in the shop is free

Report Card.Text: When round ends, before Ante score, if you have more points, gain m{} money

Rewards Card.Text: All cards you play have x{} mult

Rules card.Text: Whenever a player cannot play a card, they draw an extra card

Saboutage.Text: When round starts, Smoke 8 random opponent's deck cards

Seven Ate Nine.Text:
Whenever you remove a value card, this card gains x{}.
Cards you play have x{} mult

Sim Chip.Text: Orange cards you play have +{} more points

Sleeved Card.Text: Start each round with n{} less card

Snake Eyes.Text: Odd cards you play have x{} mult

Sneak.Text: Your opponent starts each round with n{} more card

Speedrun Timer.Text: When round ends, gain +{} points. That amount is decreased by n{} for each turn that passed (Minimum 0)

Split Second.Text: The first time you play a n{} value card, Refresh a random Side Card

Strategy Guide.Text: Whenever you Activate a Side Card, you may recycle up to c{} cards

Trading Binder.Text: Activate: Remove a card from your hand. Choose 1 out of n{} cards to add to your hand instead

Trash Compactor.Text:
Whenever you remove a card, this card gains +{} points
Cards you play have +{} more points

Triple 7s.Text: Whenever you play a 7, gain m{} money

Unsleeved Card.Text: Start each round with n{} more card

Wallet.Text: Whenever you gain money, gain that much score

Yard Sale.Text: Whenever you sell a Side Card, a random card in the shop becomes free

Game Voucher.Text: First card in the shop is free. Only on entry.
